title: Ep. - 384 - SARAH EDMONDSON FROM HBO’S THE VOW BEHIND NXIVM
description:
Sarah Edmondson from HBO’s The Vow, a nine-episode documentary series following a number of people who were deeply involved in the self-improvement group NXIVM over the course of several years. The Vow is a story of indoctrination and the step-by-step journey of NXIVM members defecting and outing the leader Keith Raniere. Sarah is the author of Scarred: The True Story of How I Escaped NXIVM, the Cult that Bound My Life.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey
